AF2.name: Auto Fire 2
AF2.description: Roll 2 dice, take best result (but still only roll damage once)

AF3.name: Auto Fire 3
AF3.description: Roll 3 dice, take best result (but still only roll damage once)

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.description: Target makes Toughness test or takes 1 damage per activation until put out

Called Shot.name: Called Shot
Called Shot.description: Choose number 1-20, if rolled exactly, target instantly dies

Cruel.name: Cruel
Cruel.description: Always deals at least 1 damage regardless of armor

Explode.name: Explode
Explode.description: On Fumble, deals max damage to user and is destroyed

Gas.name: Gas
Gas.description: Toughness test or Poisoned, 2 damage if end turn in Gas

Jam.name: Jam
Jam.description: On Fumble weapon jams instead of dropping

Ranged.name: Ranged
Ranged.description: Can attack up to 12 inches away

Reach.name: Reach
Reach.description: Attack enemy 2 inches away without provoking attack back

Reload.name: Reload
Reload.description: Must spend movement reloading before next use

Smoke.name: Smoke
Smoke.description: Obscures vision, Toughness test or 1 damage

Thrown.name: Thrown
Thrown.description: Can be thrown up to 6 inches
